# Security Policy

## Status: Experimental MVP
**nojs** is currently in an experimental phase. It has not been audited for security and is **not recommended for production use** with sensitive data.

## Reporting a Vulnerability
If you discover a security vulnerability, please do not report it publicly. Instead, email:

**nojs-security-report@googlegroups.com**

We will acknowledge your report within 72 hours and work on a fix as quickly as possible.
